Key Match Events: Paul Skenes finished with two scoreless innings, retiring Jazz Chisholm Jr. with a 99.6 mph fastball.
Pre-Game Insights: Paul Skenes capped off his rookie season with a strong performance against the Yankees.
Manager Derek Shelton praised Skenes' rookie campaign, comparing him favorably to past elite pitchers like CC Sabathia, David Price, and Chris Archer.
Post-Match Reflections: Paul Skenes expressed gratitude for finishing his season with the Pirates, especially against this lineup.
Derek Shelton reflected positively on the workload management plan for Skenes, noting it worked well.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Skenes finished with an 11-3 record, a 1.96 ERA, a 0.95 WHIP, and 170 strikeouts over 133 innings pitched.
Skenes anticipates improvement for the 2025 season, aiming to win many games.
